topic.title: Recommended specification
topic.shortdesc: Minimum hardware and software requirements to install and run Couchbase Server.

body.p:
The hardware and software requirements may vary depending on the type of your machine and operating system, but the general prerequisites include:
Dual-core CPU running at 2GHz
4GB RAM (physical) For development and testing purposes, you can use the reduced CPU and RAM resources compared to the specified minimum. You can use as low as 1GB of free RAM beyond operating system requirements and a single CPU core. For production, however, the minimum specification must be implemented.
